503.description: The Health Check is not successful

patch.description: Limited to Super Admin role or the user themselves.

delete.description: Limited to Super Admin role or the user themselves.

get.summary: Get all users in the system. Limited to Super Admin role.

200.description: The URL to the customer portal

isSuper.description: Is the user a super user. Only set if the user is the current user. Will not be set for list responses.

successFrontendPath.description: The path on frontend to which Stripe should redirect the customer after payment. This is appended to the host configured in the StripeClientConfigurationService

cancelFrontendPath.description: The path on frontend to which Stripe should redirect the customer after payment cancellation. This is appended to the host configured in the StripeClientConfigurationService
